name: Josh Allen
aiNotes: Input order/previous rank confirmed from your uploaded ESPN list.
Continuity with OC Joe Brady through camp; scheme stability matters for weekly floor.
WR/TE room retooled (Keon Coleman, Curtis Samuel, Joshua Palmer; Dalton Kincaid ascendant) — clearer target distribution post-Diggs era.
OL continuity spotlighted in camp coverage — fewer moving parts than many contenders.

name: Lamar Jackson
aiNotes: Addition of Derrick Henry to a Monken offense emphasizes physical rushing identity while preserving spread looks.
Camp reports note minor injury scare but practicing — no role change expected.
Core weapons (Zay Flowers/Mark Andrews) intact; continuity with Monken.

name: Patrick Mahomes
aiNotes: WR room now deeper (Rashee Rice situation cooling, plus Xavier Worthy & Hollywood Brown); upside for cleaner spacing than 2023–24.
Continuity with Andy Reid/Matt Nagy and Kelce — elite weekly ceiling even without gaudy team WR1.

name: Jalen Hurts
aiNotes: Eagles shifted to Kevin Patullo as OC for 2025; but line + core (A.J. Brown, DeVonta Smith, Saquon) keep the rushing/goal-line equity strong.
Top-tier OL continuity remains a team identity.

name: Joe Burrow
aiNotes: Fully healthy entering camp after last year’s injuries; workload not limited.
Tee Higgins signed long-term — WR1/WR2 stability restored with Ja’Marr Chase.
OC Dan Pitcher continuity.

name: Kyler Murray
aiNotes: Second year with OC Drew Petzing and a full offseason healthy; scheme continuity.
Marvin Harrison Jr. gives a true alpha WR — camp buzz on chemistry with Kyler.

name: Jayden Daniels
aiNotes: Year 2 with Kliff Kingsbury; stability and designed run usage should persist.
No major negative camp developments; role locked as unquestioned QB1.

name: Caleb Williams
aiNotes: New HC Ben Johnson (offensive pedigree) — schematic upgrade signal.
WR room pivots to DJ Moore + Rome Odunze after Keenan Allen’s departure; still strong supporting cast.
Positive camp momentum for young skill group.

name: Justin Herbert
aiNotes: Harbaugh/Roman run-heavy DNA, but passing efficiency focus noted in camp.
Keenan Allen back in LAC and building with Ladd McConkey — weapons upgraded from 2024.

name: Dak Prescott
aiNotes: Cowboys list Brian Schottenheimer as head coach (2025) and Klayton Adams as OC — new structure to monitor.
CeeDee Lamb locked in; core passing game intact.

name: Brock Purdy
aiNotes: Aiyuk extended — core pass-game continuity with Shanahan remains elite.
OL depth questions linger; could cap dropback volume in certain matchups.

name: Tua Tagovailoa
aiNotes: Signed long-term extension; organizational commitment secure.
Mike McDaniel retains play-calling — scheme continuity for Tyreek/Waddle stack.
Minor WR camp dings but both stars trending fine.

name: Jordan Love
aiNotes: Big 4-year extension in place — no role uncertainty.
WR room banged up (Watson PUP; Reed foot) as camp winds down — early-season target continuity a concern.
Luke Getsy back on staff as senior offensive assistant — familiarity with Love.

name: Jared Goff
aiNotes: Ben Johnson departed; John Morton officially hired as OC — some change, but continuity under Campbell.
Goff extended through 2028; core OL and Amon-Ra/St. Brown stability.
Camp notes positive on offense under Morton in joint work.

name: Matthew Stafford
aiNotes: Returned to practice after back flare-up; trending toward Week 1.
WR room upgraded: Rams moved on from Kupp and signed Davante Adams to pair with Puka.
OC Mike LaFleur continuity; offense expected to look similar with Adams wrinkles.

name: Justin Fields
aiNotes: Jets list Fields as QB1 on the unofficial depth chart heading into Week 1.
Rodgers moved on; no looming QB controversy in NYJ room.
Camp emphasis on efficient passing; WR depth beyond Garrett Wilson still in flux.

name: Baker Mayfield
aiNotes: OC change: Liam Coen left; Bucs named Josh Grizzard offensive coordinator. Scheme transition risk.
WR room has dealt with camp injuries beyond Evans/Godwin — depth being tested.

name: Bo Nix
aiNotes: Sean Payton committed to Nix with steady messaging; no QB controversy.
Courtland Sutton reworked deal/extended — top target retained; OL continuity emphasized in camp.

name: Drake Maye
aiNotes: Named starter under Jerod Mayo with OC Alex Van Pelt continuity.
WR room looks deeper than 2024 (ESPN shows Stefon Diggs plus veterans/youngsters) — notable upgrade in weaponry.
OL still shuffling in camp; some early volatility likely.

name: J.J. McCarthy
aiNotes: Vikings have transitioned to McCarthy as starter; staff building plan around him.
Jordan Addison suspended first 3 games — early-season WR2 absence could dampen start.
